TopicTitle: In photo mode, Blueprint view does not disappear. [VAB]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Microsoft Windows 11 Home 10.0.22621 64-bit | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600H with Radeon Graphics (12) | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU (3977MB) | RAM: 15711

 

Severity: Minimal / Low - Only visual, does not affect gameplay, requires player to intensely look for it..

Description: By pressing the view cube in the VAB and then the F2 key for photo mode, the blueprint view will not disappear until the cube is pressed again. So, it's not that big of a deal.
But, even if you move around whilst in photo mode and blueprint view, it will not disappear unless photo mode is exited. It'll also show some other things hidden behind the walls..

This is able to be done at anytime in the VAB, no matter how many times it's repeated.

Clear Steps:
1. Click any view on the view cube inside the VAB.
2. Once in blueprint view, press F2 / Photo Mode
3. You are now free to look around.

4. To go back, simply click the cube again, and exit normally.

 

Included Attachments:

PressingF2inBlueprintmodelocksit._logs.zip
